coded_answer.p: São Rafael, 13/06/00
Dear Helen
I'm pleased to receive your litterletter and realyreally happy that I won the first prize.

I would prefer to travel only onin July because it's when my vacations start. I could even think about skyping'sskipping school. July is also good because the wethearweather is warm and I could enjoyedenjoy mormore the time that I will spend in the campthe time I will spend in the camp more. I would prefer thea tendstentstent because I'll be in touch with the nature and I could listen to the sounds of the night. The two activities that I've chosen are Climbing and Photography. I've already climbed for four months on walls, indoor climbing. I think I can handdehandle it very well. I've choosenchosen Photography because I love to take pictures! I've never chosechosentaken any classes or training but I think I can take very good pictures. I would like to learn more about developing films.
I have some questions myself,. I would like to know:
. if I have to take any special equipementequipment tofor the activities that I've chosen
. If I have to take lots of clothes or is there a service to wash them.
. What kind of chosen do I have to take
. IfWhether is therethere is a phone, a fax or e-mail so I can be in touch with my familiefamily?.
. If I have to take any money. If yesso how much?
I hope I've answered all youyour questions and I would be pleasepleased if mine could also be answered.
youryours sincerely,
Sabrina Rodriguez
São Rafael, 13th June 2000
Dear Kim,

How are you? What have you been doing there in New York? Did you find a girlfriend? Yesterday was Valentine's day here in Portugal,. In particurelyparticularlyIn particular I had to spend it alone... again.

I'm writing to you to tell you about a pop concert that happendhappened here in São Rafael. Red Hot Chilli PepersPeppers came here for a short time and they played at the "Chedicard Hall". It was realyreally cool because I did some backstage jobwork. I helped with the clothing, with some paperwork, with the microphones, with the computers. I was everywhereverywhere. I was kind of a "handy girl". I did a little bit of everything.. The best part was when the band arrived. I took lots of pictures, asked for authographsautographs and I even gave them my celcell phone number! They promissedpromised me that they would call me some daysomeday, whatwhich I particularyparticularly doubt. Some thingSomething that was also great was to watch the show from the back stagebackstage. It's ana unique experience. I wished you could behave been there with me.
I hope you answer this letter as quikquickquickly as possible with lots of thing to tell me.
Lots of kisses and hugs
Your pen friend
Sabrina Rodriguez
